description: The Tidepool Tech Shirt is a technical, yet utilitarian woven shirt for all occasions. Constructed of super fast drying cotton-poly fabric with a vented back yoke, the Tidepool is techy enough to ward off the elements but steers clear of some of the nerdy pitfalls of other “technical” wear by keeping it simple and user friendly for daily wear.
name: Howler Bros Tidepool Tech Shirt - Mens
